website_summaries.verdict: This handheld detector offers 360-degree side-scan and pinpoint detection with audio and vibration signals to locate treasure and lost items.
pros: Three level settings adjust for detection distance
Detects metal objects up to 5 centimeters under surface, or away from wand
Button press filters out environment and narrows detection parameters
cons: The probe portion is waterproof, not the whole unit
Must be right over object to detect it

customer_reviews.title: Pinpointer is essential
customer_reviews.text: The search coil of my metal detector gets me within a foot of the target; this pinpointer saves a lot of time and effort and is very easy. The beeps get closer together as you near the target.
customer_reviews.author: James Dinsmore

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work great.  Much less than some models.
customer_reviews.text: I have not used a pin pointer before, so I don't know how this compares to the ones that sell for over one hundred bucks, but this works fine for me and really helps find the treasure. It is a bit difficult to see the LED on light, but a quick pass near anything metal and you know it is on. Beeps within and inch or two of the coin targets, so very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: This works great!! what ever you do don't let it ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great!! what ever you do don't let it get in the water, I accidently dropped mine in the water at the beach and it started to go crazy I couldn't use it for 2 days I took the battery out and let it dry completely and now it's back to working fine again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Bacha

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Better than expected! Mine actually detects about 4 inches deep!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: ... located them we found them repaired the floor it’s great for finding studs in the wall electrical but I ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy this product for such a long time and then I lost a pair of earrings in the house in between the floorboard in the wall and couldn’t find them this one located them we found them repaired the floor it’s great for finding studs in the wall electrical but I am waiting more anxiously to take it to the beach
customer_reviews.author: Judith Megna

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and good!
customer_reviews.text: Works Great! I struggled with this purchase because, like most, I want to have the best of everything. But after i used this two things happened. First of all the product worked very well. Then i thought about the concept. My metal detector already found the coin. All this did was locate it in the dirt that I dug. You just do not need anything more than this. The biggest difference in this one and an expensive one is simply the price. Its just a simple tool. So don't beat your head on the wall over buying something so simple. These work great.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Great price. I bought a garrett for over $100 and this works just as well. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pin pointer detector
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent pin pointer detector, sensitive enough to detect very small objects (e.g., a single office staple). The detector is well made and with care should last a long time. Packaging and delivery were excellent too.
customer_reviews.author: MB Kayakus americanus

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works very well. Glad I bought this one and saved a ton of money. It will save you a lot of time trying to locate an object. I’ll by from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Black Turtle Dive Gear

customer_reviews.title: Good little mini detector!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to look for metal in wood before planing/cutting. Works all the way down to tacks and staples, but must be close. Very pleased with this detector so far. May even use it along with my larger metal detector for some prospecting!
customer_reviews.author: Willis Sellars

customer_reviews.title: pin pointer metal detector
customer_reviews.text: works good, not waterproof so don't even try it, does not discriminate metals, very good value
customer_reviews.author: bnj

customer_reviews.title: Easily 2 inch depth sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: Very sensitive. Easily 2 inch depth sensitivity, but at least an inch more with a hack. Very sensitive around high EMFs, such as underground wires or near ground transformers. Vibrates and beeps when near target.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Clendenin

customer_reviews.title: A real money-saver (compared to Garrett) and works great
customer_reviews.text: I had already purchased a Garrett pin pointer for my oldest grandson. Its works great of course, but the price was painful. Then a younger grandson was ready to go metal-detecting and was needing a pin pointer also. So I tried this Kuman device, which is an obvious imitation, but it was significantly cheaper than the Garrett and works just as well (plus it has an LED light). I had to supply and install the batteries in the Kuman (the Garrett came with batteries and ready to go), but at this cost savings it was well worth it. I'm 100% pleased with my decision to make this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T.M. Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: It was shipped fast. I love that it is waterproof. The clip on lanyerd keeps it from getting lost or left behind as I move around to find more buried treasures. It does everything I wanted it too.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and affordable
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a metal detector person and the first time out using this pin pointer, he found a ring and lots of change. He gave rave reviews about it's accuracy - and mentioned this is as good as a more expensive brand out there (I don't know which one).
customer_reviews.author: Annamarie

customer_reviews.title: my best investment
customer_reviews.text: this is a must for any metal detecting hunting. its strong and accurate very convenient, easy to use, durable, this one is water proof , i used in streams in the water and is very accurate , I introduced this item to a friend he now got ride of the one he had and bought this kuman pin pointer and loves it , i think its awesome my self,
customer_reviews.author: Dennis D.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap assembly.
customer_reviews.text: worked great while it worked. had it for just over a month and the button assembly fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Erika D.

customer_reviews.title: KUMAN PIN POINTER WATERPROOF METAL DETECTOS
customer_reviews.text: I did an air test (above ground test) and got about 1 1/4" for coins up to a quarter the quarter came in about 1 1/2". I then super tuned it using a stainless steel washer and was able to increase the depth to 2 1/2", it is a lot easier to find the objects now that I'm using this inexpensive pin pointer. I cant see that the light is any help and it doesn't say anything about being waterproof on the box or in the instructions so I'm not going to test for that.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL R. BERRY

customer_reviews.title: It don't work
customer_reviews.text: It don't work.I put in a fresh 9 volt battery and this thing could not pick up my metal car keys, no matter the distance. Seriously this detector needs major work on it and could use a headphone jack and some sort of volume control. I thought this would work as a close end metal detector for smaller areas that I would not or could not use a full sized metal detector at. It does not work and I am going to end up returning this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey 440Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Kumon pinpointer
customer_reviews.text: I have a Vibraprobe and. Fisher. They are both better, more depth and sensitivity...but they cost substantially more. I got this for my kid as his first pinpointer. Just turn on and go. No settings to worry about. He’s still learning the basics and this works well for him. If his interest and skill level grows, he will use one of my other probes, or get one of his own. Still great for a backup. It works great and helps him locate whatever his detector hits on. Even hit on very small nails and screws. It’s a great pinpointer for a beginner or someone short on disposable income.
customer_reviews.author: Fed Up

customer_reviews.title: Nice for coin hunting
customer_reviews.text: I've used this pointer to find coins after I've dug a hole where my metal detector indicates a hit. It has cut my find time by 70% because my large metal detector is not good at pin pointing where exactly the object is located, just a general vicinity. This pointer sometimes keeps beeping even when there is no metal around. Just turn in off and back on, takes 2 seconds. This only happens occasionally. Other than that, its a great product and $80 less than the Garrett for basically the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Constant Falsing
customer_reviews.text: I spend more time turning on and off to reset than using it. It can laying on the the ground and when I pick it up it will start beeping and will not quit until I turn it off and on again 2/26 Update: Should have sent it back, but didn't. It has now failed. The switch broke. Lasted 45 days. 3/9 Update: Revised rating to buy. Contacted seller, sent replacement quickly. Have not used replacement. I bought another pin pointer from amazon and can tell you, it does not compare to this one in sensitivity. Give this pin pointer a try. Good seller support.
customer_reviews.author: Deep1

customer_reviews.title: ... told me that it might not have been soldered good and the wires came loose sorry cant give you ...
customer_reviews.text: you get what you pay for it works but i would use it as a back up my lasted about 4 months and quit working i put new batteries in it and still nothing then after about 15 min it started chirping very fast and they started smoking took it apart and the wires had melted and the board was black so i called the company and they told me that it might not have been soldered good and the wires came loose sorry cant give you your money back so as i said you get what you pay for go with the garrett at pro-pointer
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Beep beep
customer_reviews.text: When my metal pointer arrived I powered it up and tried it on the smallest metal staple I had. Put it in the dirt and it worked great. Used it later as a pin pointer when looking for objects with my metal detector and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Fus

customer_reviews.title: Get a better one.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for one week. Then it started pinging nonstop every few uses. I have to turn it off and then turn it back on to get it to stop the constant buzzing. Accuracy is fairly good if yours will actually work but I’d suggest putting the money toward a better one. This one is definitely cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Watson

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk was out of my return limit to get a refund. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: April May

customer_reviews.title: I knew better
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for. There is a reason the real ones are $100 more. This didn't work out of the box but the LED worked. I basically bought a crappy $30 flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: mark rodocker

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes it just keeps beeping—only turning it off stops it.
customer_reviews.text: This seemed to work a few times, then it started just beeping continuously and I had to keep turning it off in order to get it to stop. When it did work, it was pretty accurate, and and was able to detect very tiny fragments of wire, coins, and large pieces of metal. Ended up having to return it since it got to the point of being more frustrating than useful. I do not recommend buying this at all. I should have read the other 1-star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: T. Denyer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: TLDR works pretty good, has 3 modes which is a audible beep, or vibration, or both at the same time. It has 4 levels of beeping to let you know how close you are. It's loud and the beeping gets annoying fast - put a piece of tape over the speaker hole to save your sanity. Mine did not come with a hard plastic case (but i dont use it in water) it came with a thick clear flexible sleeve which material is like a pool floaty toy or whatever. Like the clear back packs material which is flexable. All in all for beginner prospectors and metal detector users its a well built durable detector for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Davey

customer_reviews.title: This is the same metal detector as the Uniroi that cost half as much
customer_reviews.text: They both use a 9v battery, look identical, and work pretty much the same, so why pay double when you can buy the Uniroi for half as much. They are not water proof unless you put them in a plastic sleeve which they both come with, plus the same belt holder, so they are identical in many ways. So I added a picture of both in the holders, they have the same buttons, LED, and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M.

customer_reviews.title: Not a disappointment at all!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pinpointer used it for about 2 weeks now, I have had no problems until now , I turned it on waited for the beep, then all of a sudden it was beeping none stop even when I pointed at the sky it still was beeping. I changed the battery, gave it a few minutes and it was back to normal. Listen whether a cheap or high end product, they all will have a glitch, so am I happy with this ? YES !!!! After all metal detecting is a hobby and not my full time job. So if you are just starting out , I recommend using this product, for the price it does work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Pugzieee

customer_reviews.title: Just one time out but it worked
customer_reviews.text: Not like my White's TRX Bullseye that I lost but I don't have $160.00 right now I have just used it on one hunt it worked very good for me if I brake this one I just lost $20.00 I can't say you will like it but for me so far I do. As far as it beeping all the time it will if you don't ground balance it Just hold the pin pointer to the ground and turn it on don't turn it on in the air hold it to the ground then turn it on . The one I just bought will work great no air noise
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Mason

customer_reviews.title: Worked as Expected - Did the job
customer_reviews.text: Like the description says you have to have an idea where the item is. In my case it was corner property markers. Husband tried it from a standing position and said it didn't work. I went out with him and sat on the ground waving it near where we thought the post was. Found it quickly about 2 inches under ground. We measured from that one across the front of yard and repeated the process. Took less than 5 minutes and found the other marker less than an inch under ground. You MUST bend way down or do it the easy way and just sit on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Dogpond

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Not accurate in the slightest. Does not do what is described in post or on the box. The "beeps" do not increase at all, it's just one steady string of beeping. It did beep at metal things, but it also beeped at the sky, a stick, a leaf (still on tree)... It's great for detecting anything and nothing at the same time.... Complete waste of time and money. Btw, the device itself is not water resistant, it comes with a water baggy.
customer_reviews.author: Geneva K.

customer_reviews.title: LED light Dont Work
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine. Put a new Duracell copper top battery in it. The detector works fine. But the LED light is dead as a hammer. Since I dont plan to detect at night, its not worth doing a return over. But it is an obvious quality control issue.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Bates

customer_reviews.title: Performs as expected
customer_reviews.text: It performs just as I expected for a pin pointer in this price range. I didn't want to spend $120 for a name brand waterproof model (don't really need waterproof). I've used it in both wet muddy and hot dry conditions and it performs great. It definitely helps reduce the time locating targets when metal detecting. I see some negative reviews here but I've been using it hard for several months now and it's still working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Estima8tor

customer_reviews.title: Every Treasure Hunters, "Must have" tool!
customer_reviews.text: Cleary to be used with a regular metal detector, which has a deeper/broader range... once you start digging, the pinpointer does just what it's made for. I found multiple items within just an hour. The pings are loud and clearly get quicker the closer you are to target. Made sifting through dig quick & easy. People even stopped to watch and wish me luck. Everyone has gold-fever. Everyone loves treasure and adventure. This helps and makes you look like a pro doing it. Don't just sit and watch Treasure of Oak Island... go get it yourself!
customer_reviews.author: PauliGMac

customer_reviews.title: When I purchased this item it said it's waterproof that's ...
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this item it said it's waterproof that's the main reason I bought it! After watching a video on it. The video says it's not waterproof! My question is, is this item waterproof or not!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: kuman great company
customer_reviews.text: Kuman is a great company! had an issue with the first one that I bought and kuman contacted me and took care of the issue right away ! although my first one had an issue I will give this pinpointer another shot just because I know that this could be a great product I already recommended this pinpointer to another friend of mine!
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work properly.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as it detects metal, it’ll beep, but it will not stop as you move it away from the object. To make it stop you have to power it down and back up but then it does it all over again. Makes it pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: Lance P.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Kuman Pin Pointer KW30 for my son for his birthday. We opened it up today and it just immediately vibrates and sounds like crazy even when there is no metal around. Can't figure out a way to reset it. We are very disappointed. Emailed the seller. Hoping to hear back from them.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price and it works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for they money. A bit noisy when the battery starts getting low but otherwise a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: TommyP

customer_reviews.title: Average quality, the holster is worthless
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for one week. Then the connections to the battery came loose and are rattling around somewhere on the inside of the detector. So obviously the quality isn’t as good as other detectors, but it worked great until it broke. The holster is worthless. It is bigger than the detector so the detector comes out with normal movement. Forget using this holster while walking over rough terrain while out metal detecting- you won’t be able to walk 20 feet before realizign that it fell out somewhere and have to go back to find it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: It works alright but not very sensitive.
customer_reviews.text: It works all right but not very sensitive. I bought it to find hidden nails in wood. It is not sensitive enough to do a good job finding nails. I have to know about where they are and just about touch them for it to work. I do not use it now unless my saw has hit a nail already and I am trying to find the nail I hit. Usually, the nails are obvious, so I do not use this often.
customer_reviews.author: Neug

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this! wouldn’t have found most the cool stuff I found with out it. it works great has a good depth reading and helps make things quick locating what I’m looking for. Found all these 200-300 year old square nails in the Charleston Harbor!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Who knew it's a stud finder too?
customer_reviews.text: I originally thought I would use this for finding lost metal toys in the back yard until I read the instructions. It is also a very accurate way to find nail heads in walls, thus locating studs with great accuracy. I have one inch thick walls constructed of rock lath and plaster coating. A traditional stud finder doesn't work so well. By finding the nail heads I find the studs.
customer_reviews.author: stair master

customer_reviews.title: It is very accurate and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very good at pinpointing metal. Glad I brought it. Have found many nails with it.
customer_reviews.author: Wabih

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected so far. Haven't found any gold yet :(
customer_reviews.author: 4WheelinGal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Very useful and handy. It seems to go haywire here there I just turn it off and then back on and all is normal again. Definitely a great value and I definitely recommend this to any metal detector enthusiast! Update* using it the other night the on/off button broke! At least three parts feel out so I’m returning it. I will order another and hope the same problem doesn’t occur.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When I bought my first detector a few weeks ago ...
customer_reviews.text: When I bought my first detector a few weeks ago, I discovered in less than an hour why all the coin hunters on YouTube use a pinpointer. It saves lots of sifting time and locates small items the eye can miss in mucky soil. This one works as advertised and is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rush

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: After one minute of using it i had beepings, it was a nail in a crevice, then another one, for gold nuggets i’m not sure it will work. It comes with a plastic housing like a bag in case you need tomget it wet. Seems sensitive but i think it won’t detect buried gold flakes or nuggets. It’s loud and vibrates hard. It feels well made and sturdy. It detects metal very good and from a good distance!
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Received this product less than 24hrs after placing my order with free shipping from Prime. I couldn't wait to try it out when I got home from work. This pin-pointer works great so far, only used for about 10min in the backyard. Mine came with a lanyard & a waterproof bag which I didn't realize was part of the deal...bonus. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I did get to use this as we got hit hard by a flood and would have sent it back. You need to be near the ground so wish it had a extender so I don’t have to bend down to use it with back problems. But I could have spent more money and got a better one. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: vicki chapman

customer_reviews.title: Did not work correctly
customer_reviews.text: The pin pointer looked good but did not work right. The switch would not shut the pin pointer off. Instead, the unit vibrated and sounded off even when not near metal. The only way to shut off the pin pointer was to remove the battery. Where was the quality control when the pin pointer was built?
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I unpacked it, read the instructions, and inserted the battery; it doesn't work. It's as if there was no battery in the device. I'm pretty unhappy. UPDATE: Upon reading my review, the seller contacted me to ask how he might remedy the situation. He sent a new product that works quite well. I'm happy with this outcome!
customer_reviews.author: Spag! 5th SFG(A)

customer_reviews.title: Shipping
customer_reviews.text: I recieved a empty package today and a text that my pin pointer was delivered all I got was a empty padded envelope, the package was lost for a couple of weeks I guess USPS at least found the envelope so that's what I got ... I have bought a pin pointer here before with no trouble and product works fine and will try again in the future but this is frustrating
customer_reviews.author: jason gardner

customer_reviews.title: not water resistant, only used three times.
customer_reviews.text: I used this three times. The fourth time i went to use it and when i turned it on it just kept beeping rapidly until i removed the battery. Changed the battery and had the same problem. From what I've read the slightest amount of condensation gets inside and they stop working. Pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like this alot small powerfull and the lights is a very good idea vibrates and its loud to let you know on the smallest object in the soil and the belt holster is a good idea the slinky i like to so if anybody goes to get it go for it its very good and a good price
customer_reviews.author: Mark paez jr

customer_reviews.title: Broken out of the box. UPDATED!
customer_reviews.text: 2 new batteries would not work. I will amend this review when I get the replacement and field tested it. UPDATE: Seller had the replacement delivered the next day and before I could send the original back. New battery install and it worked as expected. Let the field testing begin. Kudos to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: ProBait

customer_reviews.title: This pinpointer seems to be a good buy so far
customer_reviews.text: This pinpointer seems to be a good buy so far. I have used it a couple of times and it has really helped in narrowing things down. Definitely a must have for anyone that is into metal detecting.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: He is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses it every time he goes metal detecting. He is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Den

customer_reviews.title: Completely worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Works great better then another cheaper pinpointer I had before. I have used it on the beach and solid dirt with no issues. Great on the beach finds it really easy when putting tip into sand. Never used the water protector sleeve it came with. I don't plan on getting it wet anyways. Belt holder fits on to my Garrett bag without a problem and is easy in and out of holster when leaning down on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H

customer_reviews.title: Worked
customer_reviews.text: I needed to find a brass shut off valve for my lawn sprinklers. I knew about where to look but could not find it with a probe. Using the metal detector I found it in two min.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Mattoon

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this thing works. It gets the job done. I lost my Garrett, and couldn't justify the price again, so I tried this. It's not a Garrett. But it works relatively well. Sometimes won't stop indicating and has to be restarted, but for the price I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: schreiberea

customer_reviews.title: Works, but...
customer_reviews.text: It works very good for finding objects, however, sometimes it wont stop beeping while searching and you have to hold it up in the air to make it stop beeping.
customer_reviews.author: mrmark

customer_reviews.title: Works very good
customer_reviews.text: There are so many detecting wands on the market and they all seem to look the same and maybe most are but didn't want to chance it. I waited the extra time to recieve this brand because of the good reviews and I'm glad I did because it works great.
customer_reviews.author: ∵¤§ãΐŋ†♣∀₦₲ξℜ◈∴

customer_reviews.title: Started to work, but ceased. 😢
customer_reviews.text: This started off amazing, but very quickly, it ceased to work. It would let off weird beeps, and it would stay like that, no matter how close you are to the metal. Very diasappointing. It seemed to be so good. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to blow a ton on a pin-pointer so I got this guy on sale. It does the job. It can detect stuff about an inch away from the end. The little light on the end is nice too when you're digging through dark dirt or deep in a hole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: Using with my metal detectors! Love the belt holster !!! Pin Pointer works just like the more expensive Garrett !!! I like the way it vibrates !!! Keeps the noise down when you are around other people in parks or near water !!! Great Buy !!!
customer_reviews.author: James D. Dorman

customer_reviews.title: Not a pinpointer
customer_reviews.text: This is a small metal detector not a pinpointer. It starts beeping 3"-4" from the target and never increases or decreases beep speed/intensity. A 12" area isn't pinpoint. I have no idea why it's rated so high unless it's mostly being used as a tiny metal detector.
customer_reviews.author: mblackwell

customer_reviews.title: A great, affordable option.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother who recently got into metal detecting. He mentioned that he needed something to help him pinpoint the items better and that's when we came across this. It's absolutely great for the price and he hasn't had any issues at all. I would recommend getting this seeing as it does the same thing as others but for a more reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Works Great So Far
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it out on the hunt a few times, but it's been spot on. I really can't say how water resistant it is (it's NOT waterproof) but the product does come with a clear, soft plastic case that seems robust enough for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad pinpointer for my second rig. Not as sensitive as the higher dollar ones but works great for the money
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1

customer_reviews.title: Is a must to have for pin pointing exact location for small objects
customer_reviews.text: I can not metal detect without it anymore, it has become my main tool when pinpointing for small objects, very accurate, bright color so you don't leave it behind. I like that it comes with plastic cover and belt attachment too.
customer_reviews.author: LetsrollQ

customer_reviews.title: Check this out before spending big $$$ elsewhere...
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I pulled the trigger on this. Almost bought one 4x its price but couldn't do it and I'm glad. This works just as well as top dollar pin pointers except you can have 2(one as a back up) for half the price of one name brand
customer_reviews.author: ManWithThePlan

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: This pinpointer does what it is supposed to do. Once I have picked up a signal this zeros in on the object. So if you are on a budget this is a good product. The only draw back to it is that after locating a target it will randomly keep beeping. I have to shut it off and turn it back on. If I am detecting for a few hours this gets REALLY annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Works great for an affordable pin pointer!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I don't know how I managed without it. I wish you could turn it on directly to vibrate mode, but other than that no complaints!! Seems to work as well as the name brand ones, although I haven't put it under water completely. It has held up to sand wet and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Very Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Love it. Easy to use, very accurate. I've use it in the rain and freezing cold. No issues at all. Highly recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: jerry yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: It's alright..
customer_reviews.text: So it's a really good pinpointed the only annoying thing is that when I put the detector in the hole and search for something it will beep once I remove the detector from the hole it stays beeping when nothing is there....
customer_reviews.author: Travis.k

customer_reviews.title: And the winner is !!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so impressed with this pin pointer ! I tested it against the $120 one and mine picked up a smaller pice of gold that it did. I would recommend this to anyone who prospects for gold or metal detectors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: I have only practiced with it,but it did work well.Had a small problem with the product add and description,,the seller took care of the problem very fast.May update to 5 stars as I use this item when I really get out to use it.So far.pleased.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Garrett
customer_reviews.text: Works but you get what you pay for. Returned and got garret. Glad I spent money and you will as well. Step up and buy the Garrett, this one will disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: mike frost

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for I guess
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work tight out of the box but after some field use it just tones on everything. I took the batteries out for a while and tried it again and it seems to work now but I’m skeptical as to weather or not it will keep working
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly well for the cost. I suppose it's supposed to look like the Garrett Carrot right? I have a white's bullseye that I have to say does work as well as this. Good buy for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: William Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not Quite What I Hoped For
customer_reviews.text: The product works well for only an inch or so of a buried metal object. I was hoping for a little deeper penetration to locate the survey pin on my lot, but it wouldn't pick it up despite it only being buried about 2".
customer_reviews.author: Rick Schappacher

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: For the price this works well. Wish it had a one button on/off for previous setting. I find it is annoying in target rich use where you are turning it back on and off with multiple button pushes.
customer_reviews.author: GF.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews, I decided to give this a try. We absolutely love it. It works great! Very easy to use. Easy to hold. I love the waterproof bag. Which it fits into perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Try it and its great for a person starting out, also its water resistant but not water proof do not submerged it in the water.
customer_reviews.text: We just used the pin pointer and it worked ok , found a couple of wheat pennys in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Bud

customer_reviews.title: Ordered Two. Both do not work as intended. Useless! Had to return both.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these. I had to return both of them. They do not increase the beeps the closer you get to target. It only makes the same exact intensity no matter how close or far from the target you are. Does not change at all! The box clearly says "Alarms increase in intensity based on target's proximity. " I am so disjointed. I bought them for my two young sons to use this weekend while at their grandpas house but i had to tell them they don't work. I would look elsewhere for a pin-pointer.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: This works great!
customer_reviews.text: This was the least expensive handheld detector I saw, but I decided to give it a try and I’m glad I did. If you’re after something in a very defined area on the surface, the detector generally will respond within 4” of the object. It took several passes but I was able to locate a small nut the ground had swallowed up.
customer_reviews.author: Coffeeman

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works great love this piece, however only water resistant when wrapped in bag provided. Slightly misleading but good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Z's Beez

customer_reviews.title: More fun
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband as part of his anniversary present. He finally was able to use the wand last week and quickly honed in on some coins in our backyard. He can't wait to go real "treasure" hunting.
customer_reviews.author: T. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well once an object is located to sort through debris. Due to my hearing loss I can’t hear the sound it makes but it does vibrate when you’re near the object so that’s a plus for me
customer_reviews.author: James F.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use my 4 year old uses it.
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what it should be detects at about 2-3"away and beeps faster the closer you get. Better accuracy then with a larger detector. Love it my daughter had a blast using it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Failed after about 20 uses
customer_reviews.text: Vibration motor went out on it and the beeper is going next, even with new batteries. Has never gotten wet. *company warrantied replacement after I emailed them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I used this to find our underground property boundary markers. I already knew the location within a few feed so I scanned close to the ground and it worked fine to pinpoint the location. Just what I needed to avoid a much more expensive detector (which you would want if you need to scan a large area).
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Treasure Hunting
customer_reviews.text: pin pointer for finding coins , silver, gold. uses 9 volt battery. Only used about the house because the weather has been bad. Waiting for good weather so I can go outside and do some treasure hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Al Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: This metal detector is awesome! My granddaughter went detecting with us and she was killing it! Super easy to use and pretty much appropriate for most ages!
customer_reviews.author: D. Frances Young

customer_reviews.title: A very helpful tool to augment a regular metal detector
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time today. Essentially, it's a close-range metal detector that you can jab into the dirt to "fine tune" the search. It makes incredibly quick work of using the regular stand-up metal detector.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product works as advertised. I don't see much difference between this product and the Garrett Pro Pointer.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

product_meta.title: Kuman Pin pointer Water Resistant Metal Detectors with Holster Treasure Hunting Unearthing Tool Accessories Buzzer Vibration Automatic Tuning KW30
feature_bullets: 360° side-scan and Pinpoint tip detection. Please kindly note that this is kuman brand, the only store name is kumanshop, the other is unauthorized product. Our pinpointer metal detector kit include the waterproof case, it is freely for you to use underwater.

High Sensitivity: High Sensitivity for improved detection of small targets, it can work indoors, outdoors, on sand, lawn or in soil, locate coin, silver, jewelry and gold with speed and accuracy. Three sensitivity levels with different LED indicators light, audio and vibrate alert.
One- One-touch operation:Quick button press instantly tunes out environment or narrows detection field for precise pinpointing of larger targets

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,261 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
